item.title: From Michoacán to Hollywood: Los Bukis Cements 51 Years of Musical and Cultural Legacy on Walk of Fame
item.description: Ario de Rosales is a pueblo in the Mexican state of Michoacán, a center for agriculture and livestock, and home to less than 40,000 people. It was there, in a modest working-class home beneath clay-ti
